definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people

sentences.english: Her previous life is his father's lover.
sentences.chinese: 女兒是父親上輩子的情人。

sentences.english: I would like to be a novelist who is more accomplished than the last one.
sentences.chinese: 我想當個比上輩子更成功的小說家。

sentences.english: I think I owe you is a former life , so I now subject to such torture .
sentences.chinese: 我想我是上輩子欠你的，所以我現在受如此的折磨。

sentences.english: Because last generation we were lovers.
sentences.chinese: 因爲上輩子我們在一起。

sentences.english: You are my previous life to the welfare of hard to repair.
sentences.chinese: 你是我上輩子苦苦修來的福。

sentences.english: When, eventually, they retire it will be on pensions far lower in real terms than those of their immediate forebears.
sentences.chinese: 最終當他們退休時據條款的退休金會遠低於上輩人。

sentences.english: Yes, there is. Teenagers do not want to live traditonal lives.
sentences.chinese: 有的，青少年不喜歡過上輩人的生活。

sentences.english: Each of the children, past life was not hurt is broken winged Orleans roast chicken wings.
sentences.chinese: 每個傷不起的孩子，上輩子都是折翼的奧爾良烤雞翅。

sentences.english: I must owe you too much in the preexistence, so that I need pay you back this life.
sentences.chinese: 一定是上輩子我欠你的，這輩子要我來還你。

sentences.english: Maybe in another life I could have been an ER triage guy.
sentences.chinese: 也許上輩子我是名急診室醫生。
